title.us: Attacking with spoofing and DoS on a WordPress website
title.es: Ataque de Spoofing and DoS sobre un website WordPress

description.us: This practice will allow you to better understand spoofing and DoS techniques, as well as their effects in a web environment.
description.es: Esta práctica te permitirá entender mejor las técnicas de spoofing y DoS, así como sus efectos en un entorno web.
